title: [Poster] Darkserver: Help to Debug Userspace
summary:
Darkserver is a set of tools and service written in Python to help
developers to debug their applications & libraries. Darkserver project
was started to use Build-ID feature of compiler toolchains and help
developer tools to identify exact package builds from which process
images (e.g. core dumps) come. This can enable their analysis, debugging
profiling.
